bio: Full-time Android developer and Part-time Contributor
impactDescription:
I am a web3 contributor in Thai community with my content to share knowledge such as 
- how to add optimism chain, how to bridge ETH from mainnet to optimism
- how to see tokenURI of your NFT
- create NFT collection with concept
- how to get transaction data from blockchain with Tripster lucky box campeign

I am excited about the ongoing opportunities to contribute to the Optimism Collective's mission. Moving forward, I am eager to create content to share knowledge to the community in Twitter and my blog that will further enhance our collective impact and solidify our position.
contributionDescription: I will support Thailand's Optimism ecosystem to grow more. Whether it's about an NFT project, a marketplace, a product, or anything like that with my content from research to let more people know about this such as interesting product, development, how to adapt to your business.

contributionLinks.description: my first NFT project in Optimism with Apetimism launchpad
how to get transaction data from blockchain with Tripster lucky box campeign
